| History                 = Taiji grew [[Wanxia (Earth-616)|Coldmoon]] and her brother [[Zaoxing (Earth-616)|Dragonfire]] in mechanical wombs as part of Project: Empty Circle, whom were to be weapons for Taiji. Based in Shanghai, Taiji supplies [[Advanced Idea Mechanics (Earth-616)|A.I.M.]] with technology/weapons that are more advanced than what A.I.M. possesses.

The corporation itself has neither a C.E.O, shareholders, or employees. It's a front but it's unknown as for whom. According to Coldmoon and Dragonfire, Taiji is infecting Earth with alien technology. Which will enslave mankind, if they are not stopped.{{r|Point One Vol 1 1}}
